subject: Re:  Dear Esteem Customer,
body:
A-1 Courier Service Ltd
Mulia Business Park,
Building F, MT Haryono
Jakarta Indonesia
WhatsApp number +62 815 2941 5763

ORDER NO.: 562725

Dear Esteem Customer

Thank you for writing A-1 Courier Service Ltd. In acknowledgment of your 
correspondence I have just been notified that you have been officially 
cleared for payment by the Verification's Dept. at the headquarters of 
the Asia Pacific Lottery Association Limited, this response is to notify 
you about your pending parcel. We are in possession of a certified ATM 
Card endorsed in your name awaiting courier delivery to you.

Your Pin Order number is 562725 we request you please reconfirm your 
alternative mailing address to ensure conformity with our record for 
immediate dispatch of your parcel.

We provide extensive delivery services to all the Asians Countries, 
Europe, Scandinavia, Canada,USA, Far East, Middle East, Africa, and 
other locations around the world, with support services to monitor all 
domestic and overseas requirements.

All your winning documents which includes your certificate and a 
covering document (Money Laundering protection and Letter of Affidavit 
for Claims) from the Indonesian government,stating that the money was 
obtained legally through the Asians Lotto will be sent to you as soon as 
you meet with any of the option selected.

You can now begin the final step of the claims process, which is the 
transferring of your delivering of your ATM Card to you. With regards to 
this, you are required to select the most convenient of the three.

The options, together with their associated conditions are presented 
below:

OPTION 1:

First class delivery: in 48 hours
(cost of delivery)
postage: 40.00 Dollars
insurance 550.00 Dollars
vat:150.00 Dollars
Total 740.00 Dollars

Premium class delivery: in 72 hours
(cost of delivery)
postage: 20.00 Dollars
insurance 400.00 Dollars
vat: 150.00 Dollars
Total 570.00 Dollars

Normal class delivery: in 116 hours
(cost of delivery)
postage: 20.00 Dollars
insurance 380.00 Dollars
vat: 150.00 Dollars
Total 550.00 Dollars

Note: A-1 Courier Service Ltd will not pay the courier fees on your 
behalf from your winning fund before delivery because your money is been 
insured by the foremost Lotto Company protected by a hardcover insurance 
policy for security reasons and as such, it cannot be deducted from, and 
we cannot do an exception. Hence you are expected to effect the payment 
from your end.

Also,you are required to send to us as soon as possible,these few 
information below:

(1.)The delivery option which you've chosen.
(2.)Your delivery address ( if you have chosen any of the option )

Having done this,you would be given proper guidelines on how and where 
to make payment.
Congratulations once again.

-- 
We are glad to be of service to you.

Mr. Eas Banyu
Customer Service
Telephone/Whats app + 62 8 570 623 3942
A-1 Courier service
Can be contacted 24 hours a day and 365 days a year.

A-1 Courier Service-it is our goal to minimize disruption caused by 
technical errors. However, some data or information on our e-mail may 
have been created or structured in files or formats that are not 
error-free and we cannot guarantee that our service will not be 
interrupted or otherwise affected by such problems.Cornerstone A-1 
Courier Service accepts no responsibility with regard to such problems 
incurred as a result of using its email.

subject: Re:  Dear Esteem Customer,
body:
Dear Mr. Eas Banyu,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding my pending parcel. I appreciate your assistance in delivering the certified ATM card endorsed in my name. However, before proceeding, I would like to clarify a few details.

Could you please provide me with more information about the Asia Pacific Lottery Limited? How did I become eligible for this lottery and what is the prize amount associated with it?

Additionally, I would like to know more about the three delivery options you mentioned. Could you explain each option in detail, including the associated costs and insurance coverage?

Thank you for your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Kristin

subject: Re: Dear Esteem Customer,
body:
Dear Mr. Eas Banyu,

Thank you for your response. I appreciate the information you have provided regarding the delivery of my lottery parcel ATM card. I would like to know more about the different delivery service options and their associated costs. Could you please explain each option in detail?

Additionally, I would like to understand why I need to pay for the delivery fee and insurance on behalf of my winning fund. Can you clarify why this is necessary? Is there any way to deduct these fees from my winnings instead of paying separately?

Lastly, could you provide me with the guidelines on how and where to make the payment once I have chosen a delivery option? It would be helpful to have clear instructions.

Thank you again for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Kristin

subject: Re: Dear Esteem Customer,
body:
A-1 Courier Service Ltd
Mulia Business Park,
Building F, MT Haryono Jakarta Indonesia
Tel:+62 815 2941 5763

ORDER NO.562725

Dear Esteem Customer,

Sequel to your email we received, We do not have the right at courier 
service to make any deduction of any kind from the winners prize.And it 
is mandatory to insured your parcel before delivery outside Indonesia so 
we can claim on in insurance if anything happens to your parcel during 
delivery process.

Secondly, delivery options depends on your choice which you must select 
the most suitable one and the time and date to arrive in your home.

We have decided earlier today on the facilitation of your delivery 
payment for your winning parcel immediately we confirm delivery fee 
payment.

Payment should be made with the below bank account details for the 
option you have chosen, to our account officer whose details are stated 
below. do endeavor to alert me as soon as you make payment with your 
scan copy for the payment receipt.

Account Details

Account name:: Dimas Arie Wibisono
Bank Name : BNI
Acc number : 1667692542
Swift code : BNINIDJA
Address : Jl.kmp bugis rt 14 tw 04 cempaka baru jakarta pusat Indonesia

NOTE: Immediately our account officer confirms your payment receipt, the 
delivery of your winning parcel will commence.

Do endeavor to immediately make the payment. And send a copy of the 
transfer or deposit slip via email for confirmation.

Awaiting your payment details.

---
We are glad to be of service to you.

Mr. Eas Banyu
Customer Service

subject: Re: Dear Esteem Customer,
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your prompt response. I understand that it is mandatory to insure the parcel before delivery outside of Indonesia. Can you please provide more information about the insurance process? How much does it cost and what does it cover?

Also, could you please explain the different delivery options available? I would like to know more about the timeframes and costs associated with each option.

Lastly, I would like to ensure that my payment is made securely. Could you please provide more details about the bank account where I should make the payment? Is there a specific reference or code that I need to include when making the transfer?

Thank you for your assistance. I look forward to your reply.

Best wishes,
Kristin

body:

subject: Re: Dear Esteem Customer,
body:
The insurance fee covers the risky of your parcel including the ATM. If 
anything happens to your parcel during delivery process or maybe 
misplacing of the parcel, then the insurance will see to it and not us. 
That is why we must insure customers parcels before delivery in order to 
be on a safer side if anything should happens to the parcel.

Our payment method is bank to bank transfer ot by Western Union money 
transfer.

---
We are glad to be of service to you.

Mr. Eas Banyu

body:

subject: Re: Dear Esteem Customer,
body:
Hello Mr. Eas Banyu,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your assistance with my parcel delivery. However, before I proceed with the payment fee, I have a few questions regarding the insurance and the process.

1. Can you please explain in more detail how the insurance works? What does it cover and for how long?

2. Is there any specific reason why I need to provide a copy of my ID card or passport? How will this information be used?

I look forward to your response and further guidance on how to proceed.

Best wishes,
Kristin

subject: Re: Dear Esteem Customer,
body:
The insurance fee covers the risky of your parcel including the ATM. If 
anything happens to your parcel during delivery process or maybe 
misplacing of the parcel, then the insurance will see to it and not us. 
That is why we must insure customers parcels before delivery in order to 
be on a safer side if anything should happens to the parcel and the 
insurance terminates once you receive your parcel.

subject: Re: Dear Esteem Customer,
body:
Hello Mr. Eas Banyu,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the insurance fee for my parcel. I appreciate your explanation about how the insurance works to cover any potential risks during the delivery process.

I have a few follow-up questions, if you don't mind. How much is the insurance fee? Is it a one-time payment or do I need to renew it for every delivery? Also, what happens if my parcel gets lost or misplaced despite having the insurance?

I understand that your courier service aims to minimize disruptions caused by technical errors, but could you please clarify what kind of technical errors you are referring to? And how do you ensure the security and confidentiality of personal information shared with your company?

Thank you again for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Kristin
